column6: SPIDER-ISLAND TIE-IN!  Flash Thompson is dropped into Ground Zero of the Infestation - but will he lose control of his emotions (and the Venom Symbiote) when his own father lies dying in the hospital? Tom Fowler (AGE OF HEROES) joins Rick Remender (X-FORCE) for part one of Venom's foray into Spider-Manhattan!
column8: | penciller:Tom Fowler | penciller (cover):Tony Moore | writer:Rick Remender
